data.title: Apple iPad Air (5th Gen) - Support Overview
data.meta_description: Find all iPad Air (5th Gen) Support information here. Learn how to activate, set up features and troubleshoot issues with our FAQs, how-to guides and videos.
data.text:
How to Use

Activate New Device - Existing Verizon Customer

Here's how to activate a new device on the Verizon network if you already have an active account.

How to Use

Apple Devices - Resolve Windows Device Manager Conflicts

Here's how to resolve driver conflicts if your Apple device doesn't properly interface with your computer.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Access Websites

Here's how to access websites on your iPad using the Safari browser.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Add / Edit / Delete a Contact

Here's how to add, edit or remove a contact entry on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Add / Remove a Wi-Fi Connection

Here's how to connect to a Wi-Fi network or remove a saved connection on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Add Data or Change Data Plan

Here's how to add to or change your Prepaid data plan on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Add a Personal / Corporate Email Account

Here's how to set up a personal / corporate email account to your Apple iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Add an iCloud Email Account

Here's how to add an iCloud email account to your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Add, Edit or Remove Calendar Events

Here's how to manage calendar events using your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Adjust Brightness & Display Settings

Here's how to adjust the display brightness or turn night shift on / off on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Allow / Block Browser Cookies

Here's how to check whether the Safari browser on your Apple iPad is set to allow cookies.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Allow / Deny Data Roaming

Here's how to turn data roaming for your Apple iPad on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Capture a Screenshot

Here's how to capture a screenshot using your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Change Device Language

Here's how to change the language and region settings used on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Check Device Storage

Here's how to free up space if your iPad runs slow / crashes, apps freeze, or you can't save media.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Clear Temporary Internet Files

If you're getting a 'page cannot be displayed' error or can't browse the internet on your iPad, view this.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Common Camera Settings

Here's some info on camera settings (e.g., flash, timer, front / rear camera) for your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Compose and Send Email Message

Here's how to create and send an email message from your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Configure Personal Hotspot Settings

Here's how to configure Mobile / Wi-Fi Hotspot Settings (e.g., password, etc.) on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Create and Send a Text Message

Here's how to create and send a text message via the Messages app on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Customize Control Center

Here's how to add and organize additional controls that appear in the Control Center of your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Customize Your Home Screen

Here's how to add / remove Home screen items (widgets, apps or folders) and set the wallpaper on your iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Download and Install Find My app

If it's not present on the device, here's how to download and install the Find My iPad app.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Edit Cellular Data User and Payment Information

Here's how to edit user and payment information for your iPad's cellular data account.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Enable / Disable / Modify SIM PIN

Here's how to change the SIM PIN for your iPad or turn it on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Enable / Disable / Modify Screen Lock

Here's how to set up, change or disable the passcode for your Apple iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Erase All Content and Settings

Here's how to factory / hard reset your iPad if the screen freezes or call, app, audio or sync issues occur.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Family Sharing - Add / Remove Members

Here's how to add or remove members to / from Family Sharing via your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Fetch New Data

Here's how to adjust how often your iPad checks for new email.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Insert / Remove SIM Card

Here's how to properly insert or remove a SIM card for your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Install Device Software Updates

Here's info on how to update your iPad to the current iOS version.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Manage Corporate Email Settings

Here's how to update work email settings for your Apple iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Manage Data Usage

Here's how to manage data settings, change the data usage cycle and set data warnings and / or limits on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Manage Home Screen and Dock Settings

Here's how to manage the Home Screen and Dock settings on your iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Manage Siri Settings

Here's how to set up Siri for your iPad and choose when it's available via voice commands.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Manage iCloud Backup Settings

Here's how to customize iCloud backup settings from your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Manually Add a Personal Email Account

Here's how to manually add a personal email account to your iPad if automatic setup fails.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Perform Wi-Fi Sync with iTunes

Here's how to use Wi-Fi sync with an iPad and a computer to allow wireless backup and sync to iTunes.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Perform a Device Restore

Here's how to restore your iPad if you're having app / touchscreen problems and / or audio and sync issues.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Record and Send Video via Messaging

Here's how to record and send a video on your iPad via the Messages app.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Remove a Personal / Corporate Email Account

Here's how to delete a personal / corporate email account from your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Reset All Settings

If your Apple iPad crashes, resets or runs slow, or apps freeze or reset the device, view this.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Reset Keyboard Dictionary

Here's how to remove saved words you have typed and return your iPad's keyboard to its default dictionary.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Reset Location Warnings

Here's how to reset your iPad's location warnings to the default settings.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Reset Network Settings

Here's how to reset settings if your iPad can't connect to data or send / receive messages.

Troubleshooting

Apple iPad - Restart Device

Here's how to restart your iPad if it crashes and resets, freezes or runs slowly.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Set Date and Time

If your iPad shows the incorrect date and / or time, view this info to correct it.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Set Default Calendar

If you have multiple calendars on your iPad (iCloud, Gmail, Work, etc.), use this info to set the default calendar.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Set Up Family Sharing

Here's how to set up Family Sharing using your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Set Up Personal Hotspot

Here's how to set up or activate the Personal Hotspot on your iPad for use as an internet or Wi-Fi connection.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Share Picture / Video from Gallery

Here's how to share a saved picture or video from your iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Sign In to Apple ID

Here's how sign in to your Apple ID to your on your iPad for use with the App Store, Apple Music, FaceTime, iMessage and more.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Sign Out of Apple ID

Here's how to remove your Apple ID from your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Take and Send a Picture via Messaging

Here's how to take a picture and send it via the Messages app on your iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Turn AirDrop On / Off

Here's how to turn AirDrop on or off to share your iPad's files with nearby Apple devices.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Airplane Mode On / Off

To turn Verizon network services on/off or if they aren't functioning on your iPad, view this info.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Turn Background App Refresh On / Off

Here's how to let apps on your iPad refresh themselves in the background.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Battery Percentage Indicator On / Off

Here's how to view or hide the remaining battery percentage of your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Bluetooth On / Off

Here's how to turn Bluetooth for your iPad on or off and make it visible to other devices for pairing.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Calls from iPhone On / Off

Here's how to turn Calls from iPhone on your iPad on or off, which allows you to make / receive calls while connected to the same network as your iPhone.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Cellular Data On / Off

Here's how to turn mobile data for your iPad on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Cellular Data for Automatic Downloads On / Off

Here's how to turn cellular data for automatic downloads on your iPad on or off.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Turn Cellular Data for FaceTime On / Off

Here's how to turn cellular data for FaceTime on your iPad on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Do Not Disturb On / Off

If your iPad isn't receiving alerts for texts and email, here's how to check Do Not Disturb settings.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Turn FaceTime On / Off

Here's how to turn FaceTime for your iPad on or off.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Turn Find My iPad On / Off

Here's how to turn the Find My iPad feature on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn GPS Location On / Off

Here's how to turn GPS location for your iPad on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Guided Access On / Off

Here's how to enable Guided Access, when you want your iPad to remain on one app and control what is available when enabled.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Handoff On / Off

Here's how to start something on one device and pick it up on other devices using your iCloud account.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Notifications On / Off

Here's how to turn status bar or banner notifications for your iPad on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Personal Hotspot On / Off

Here's how to turn your iPad's personal hotspot feature on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Picture in Picture On / Off

Here's how to turn Picture in Picture on or off, which allows you to watch a video on your iPad while completing other tasks.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Private Browsing On / Off

Here's how to turn your iPad's Private Browsing feature on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Reduce Motion On / Off

Here's how to limit movement like shifting background, zooming, etc. on the screen of your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Screen Portrait Orientation Lock On / Off

Here's how to fix the screen / display on your iPad if it doesn't flip or rotate.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Screen Time On / Off

Here's how to turn the Screen Time setting for your iPad on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Virtual Private Network On / Off

Here's how to turn your iPad's virtual private network (VPN) settings on or off.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Turn Wi-Fi On / Off

Here's how to turn Wi-Fi for your iPad on or off.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Turn iCloud Backup On / Off

Here's how to turn the iCloud backup feature for your iPad on or off.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Turn iMessage On / Off

Here's how to turn iMessages on or off for your iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Uninstall Apps

Here's how to remove or delete apps if your iPad is unresponsive, freezes or an app won't open.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Unlock Screen

Here's how to unlock the screen on your iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Use Maps

Here's how to use the Maps app on your iPad to find directions or your current location.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Use Slide Over

Here's how to open multiple apps at once on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Use Split View

Here's how to open multiple apps at once in split screen view on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - Use the Control Center

Here's how to change device settings on your iPad using the control center.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - Use the Find My App

Here's how to use the Find My app to remotely locate, lock, ring or erase iOS devices using your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - View / Manage Home Screen Panels

Here's how to view, add and remove Home screen panels on your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - View Battery Info

Here's info on the battery specs (use time, standby time, etc.) for your Apple iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - View Contact Sync Source

Here's how to view where a phonebook contact on your iPad was imported from.

How to Use

Apple iPad - View Device ID

Here's how to find the device ID (IMEI / MEID) for your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - View SIM Card Number

Here's how to view the SIM card number associated with your iPad.

How to Use

Apple iPad - View and Reply to an Email Message

Here's how to view and reply to an email message from your iPad.

Apps & Widgets

Apple iPad - View, Open or Close Recently Used Apps

Here's how to view or close recently used apps on your Apple iPad.

Troubleshooting

Apple iPad Air (5th Gen) Troubleshooting Assistant

This online tool will help you identify and resolve problems with your Apple iPad Air (5th Gen). Get online technical support and help with common issues.

How to Use

Check for Physical Damage

Here's how to help determine if your device has damage.

Troubleshooting

Check for Water Damage - Apple

Here's how to remove the SIM and view an indicator to help determine if your device has liquid damage.

How to Use

Deregister iMessage - Cannot Send/Receive SMS/MMS On a Non-Apple Device

Here's info to help If you're unable to send or receive SMS / MMS messages on a Non-Apple device.

How to Use

Device Locking FAQs

To prevent identity theft and fraud, devices bought from Verizon are locked and cannot be used on another carrier's network for the first 60 days after purchase.

Troubleshooting

Locate an iOS Device - iCloud Website

Here's how to use Find My iPhone from the iCloud website.

Troubleshooting

My Verizon Website - View Device Info

Here's how to view info (e.g., model, SIM ID, IMEI, etc.) for a device on your account via the My Verizon website.

How to Use

Turn Voice Input On / Off - Apple

You can use voice input on your iPhone or iPad to type hands-free instead of using your keyboard.

Features

Turn VoiceOver On / Off - Apple

Here's how to turn VoiceOver for your iPhone / iPad on or off.

How to Use

Video: Finding your device ID

(length: 2:09)

There are a few different ways to find your Device ID. Watch this video to see the best way to get that information.

Length: 2:09
